page.title: 01Introduction
page.content:
The survey of the area has been conducted by all the staff and children of{Twyn Junior School}with the help of parents and Mr.J.Morris of the Schools Museum Service.
The topics covered are:- 1. The wildlife of the area, a look at the flora and fauna to be found in and about the Caerphilly area. 2. Caerphilly Castle,a brief history and its modern day uses. 3. Transport, by rail and bus. 4. Every day life. 5. A look at the uses of a local community centre. 6. Education. 7. Leisure time in the area, sports and The Arts.
